section.title: Propositions of logos for Cactus
section.p: Here are contributions for a Cactus logo and associated slogan. Thanks to all that have already participated.

You can also participate by sending your proposition on the Cactus mailing list with the subject "Logo proposition". The best logo will be displayed as the official Cactus logo in the top right corner of the Cactus web site ...

section.title: Proposition 1: Classic
section.p: This is the current logo being displayed on the Cactus web site. It was designed by Lyonel Thouvenot from Octo Technology.

section.title: Proposition 2: Tomahawk
section.p: This is a proposition from Victor Gritsenko .

section.p: This is a proposition from Harish S K .

section.p: This is a proposition from Victor Gritsenko .

section.title: Proposition 13
section.p: This is a proposition from Julien Gresse.
"The thorns may sting, but the Cactus's water is crystal clear..."
"The thorns of your java code's Cactus will stung you, but with Cactus tests you could drew every drop of you code's essence."

section.title: Proposition 14
section.p: This is a proposition from Eoghan McIlwaine.
